content.question: Which of the following can be reasonably modeled by a normal distribution?

choices.label: The favorite colors of students in a kindergarten class
The heights of tomato plants that were all planted on the same day
The percent of employees from a company who attended a company retreat
The average number of siblings of all students at a particular high school

The parental guidance ratings (<math alttext="G" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>G</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>, <math alttext="P G" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>PG</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>, <math alttext="P G 13" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>PG-13</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>, <math alttext="R" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>R</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>) of movies filmed in 2019

content.answer: The heights of tomato plants that were all planted on the same day

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Compare distributions or relative positions of points within a distribution.
